newsitem.title: USA: PHLX to list Flextronics, Objective Systems options.
newsitem.headline: PHLX to list Flextronics, Objective Systems options.

text.p: The Philadelphia Stock Exchange (PHLX) said Tuesday it would list options on Flextronics International Ltd and Objective Systems Integrators Inc on December 13.
Flextronics options will have opening strike prices of 25, 30 and 35, with initial expirations in January, February, April and July, the PHLX said.
Objective Systems options will have the same expirations but opening strikes of 22-1/2, 25 and 30, it said.
Group One Ltd will be the specialist for both options. ((Derivatives desk, 3124088750/Email: derivatives@reuters.com))
